\documentclass[a4paper]{article}
\usepackage{url}
\usepackage{pst-geo}
\begin{document}
%Geographische Position von Athen nach
\url{http://gnswww.nga.mil/geonames/GNS/index.jsp: 37° 59' 00" N  023° 44' 00" E}

\bigskip
\psframebox{%
\begin{pspicture}*(-5,-155)(8,-140)
\psset{path=../data,
  level=20, unit=40, type=8, 
  latitude0=37.59,longitude0=23.44,
  rivers,borders}
\WorldMapII[Asia,Europe,maillage=false,
  linewidth=0.5pt,limiteL=190, 
  increment=2,Africa]% afrika for Turkey
\end{pspicture}}


\begin{verbatim}
\psframebox{%
\begin{pspicture}*(-5,-155)(8,-140)
\psset{path=../data, level=20, unit=40, type=8,
  latitude0=37.59,longitude0=23.44, rivers,borders}
\WorldMapII[Asia,Europe,maillage=false,
  linewidth=0.5pt,limiteL=190, 
  increment=2,Africa]% afrika for Turkey
\end{pspicture}}
\end{verbatim}

\end{document}
